## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e10120613afbbf32d487584c68eaf1ae7f4fc0674f1f119d86beae630a3b9070)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'numberpy' @ 0.1.0 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
